page.title: 12EASTRIGGS LEISURE
page.content: 635 questionnaires distributed, 130 returned, about 1 in 5. Watching TV 71; gardening 43; reading 29; pub 25; knitting 24; walking 12; swimming 11; home improvements 9; fishing 8; bingo 7; green bowling 6. Photography music, computer and sewing 5 each; Golf, keep fit, crosswords, handcrafts, cycling and home brewing/winemaking 4 each; Dancing, cub scouts, tennis, football and church work 3 each; Woodwork, pigeons, painting, majorettes; committee work, charity work, carpet bowls and motoring 2 each Rare insects, pool, athletics, hockey, volleyball, sailing, horse riding, camping, fell walking, horse racing, Burns club. whist, caravanning, bird watching, model railways, badmington, breeding show dogs, bee keeping, Women's Rural Institute, Women's Guild, putting and shooting 1 each.
